description:
When Kirino gets hooked on a portable bishoujo game and starts ignoring her friends, Aragaki Ayase asks Kyousuke for help in breaking her addiction. To help her out, Kyousuke talks to Kirino and persuades her to cut back on the game, but ends up borrowing it from her instead. Then, when Kyousuke tries playing it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je n`en reviens pas que son frère me persécute à cause d`un jeu de drague
Shinjite Okuridashita Onii-san ga Keitai Bishoujo Game ni Dohamari Shite Sekuhara Shite Kuru You ni Naru Wake ga Nai
The Onii-san I Trusted and Sent Off Can`t Get This Addicted to a Mobile Dating Sim and Commit Sexual Harassment
信じて送り出したお兄さんが携帯美少女ゲームにドハマリしてセクハラしてくるようになるわけがない
